  • Constructor Details

    • ReinforcementTile

      public ReinforcementTile​(int x, int y, int mazeSize)
      Gets maze from file, sets variables passed in the constructor and sets q-learning constants Creates a loadmap class to get the maze from the file Sets the q-learning constants Calls assign actions as this must be done before the main loop
      Parameters:
      x - the xID
      y - the yID
      mazeSize - the size of the maze

      public void setActions​(ArrayList<Action> actions)

    • invertQValues

      public void invertQValues()
      Makes all q-values in the state negative Iterates through each action and multiplies by minus 1 and updates it

    • assignActions

      public void assignActions()
      Assigns each state the possible actions If there is a free state in a direction, the action is added to the action list for the state

    • getAverageActionQValue

      public double getAverageActionQValue()
      Gets average q-value of a tile

      Iterates through each action in the tile and adds to a total Divides total by total actions to find mean average q-value

      Returns:
      The mean average q-value of the actions in a tile

    • showActions

      public void showActions()
      Prints all of the actions in the state to the console

    • inputQValues

      public void inputQValues​(String values)
      Updates the action with new q-values Iterates through the list of q-values and replaces each original q-value with new one
      Parameters:
      values - list of q-values

    • resetQValues

      public void resetQValues()
      Resets all q-values to 100 Iterates through all q-values and sets them all to 0

    • getMaxAction

      public Action getMaxAction()
      Gets the action with the largest q-value in the state Iterates through the list and compares the q-values with the current largest value
      Returns:
      the action with the largest q-value

    • storeQValues

      public String storeQValues()
      Gets a string containing a list of q-values for each state Iterates through actions list and appends the q-value to a list
      Returns:
      A string that contains all q-values for the state
